title: Kill the Dragon - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Fantasy   Mecha   School Life   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Age Progression   Alternate World   Battle Academy   Child Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Dragons   Earth Invasion   Episodic   Gate to Another World   Harsh Training   Male Protagonist   Psychic Powers   Spear Wielder   Stoic Characters   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Weak to Strong
author: BaekSoo KwiJok   백수귀족
description:
In the near future, humanity had begun a war to prevent the extinction of the human race. A fight against dragons and humans.

The so called dragons invaded Earth in an organized force from another dimension.

After three years, humans had won the war against the dragons. But… 15 years later the dragons will return for another war.>
